page.title: 20KILBURN AREA:CRAFT CENTRE
page.content:
Lines written by pupils of Denby Street Lane Primary School:
Jane Moss is a girl in our class and she lives at Park Hall Farm.It was built in 1544 and added to in 1702.It is a Craft Centre as well as a farm,the workshops being in the old stables. At the Centre they make dolls' houses.The ones we saw were St. George's Hall and two traditional ones.One of these had a doll inside, so we looked it up in the Dolls' Emporium-she was Mrs.William.St. George's Hall was white with beautiful rooms and furniture,including two tiny bottles of wine. They also make Dalewood design furniture,Barbican wooden signs and glass doors at the Craft Centre.
